name: colorfully
content:
colorfully adverb
(APPEARANCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has bright colors or a lot of different colors: The bedrooms are colorfully decorated in elegant eighteenth-century style. The people are colorfully dressed and wave cheerfully.
More examplesFewer examplesThe book is richly and colorfully illustrated with drawings, photographs, and paintings.The stage was beautifully and colorfully lit.Sean picked up a few of the colorfully wrapped candies.
